column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the chef's special spicy tonkotsu ramen and added a seasoned egg. The broth wasn't too thick which was a nice change to the starchy thick pork broths at other places. The flavor was savory with just enough spice. The extra egg was soft boiled and seasoned to perfection. Overall
column2: a great dining experience and excellent tasting food.
